replies.msg:
手動copy

[b]本實時地圖將警方嘅分佈、動向同特別情況例如衝突即時畀大家睇到。
This real time map shows the geographic distribution of conflicts and location/momentum of police force.

圖 Icons:
箭嘴 arrow = 警察動向 police momentum
車 car = 停泊警車 parked police cars
十字 cross = 急救 first aid
水 water = 物資 supplies
回收 recycle = 回收 recycle

框 Frames:
深綠 dark green = 警察數目 >200 policemen
普通綠 normal green = 警察數目 50-200 policemen
淺綠 light green = 警察數目 10-50 policemen

黃 yellow = lv 1 conflict (verbal) /衝突 (口角)
橙 orange = lv 2 conflict (physical) / 衝突 (警棍/胡椒)
紅 red = lv 3 conflict (tear gas/gun) / 衝突 (催淚/槍)

藍色框 blue frame = road block
藍色粗線 blue thick line = 水馬 water barrack[b]
